contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zogno | official_name = Comune di Zogno | native_name = | image_skyline = Zogno panorama.JPG | image_caption = Zogno | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 48 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 9 |longm = 40 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(9,034)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Lombardy]] | province = [[Province of Bergamo]] (BG) | frazioni = Endenna, Somendenna, Grumello de' Zanchi, Poscante, Stabello, Miragolo San Marco , Miragolo San Salvatore | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 34.9 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 9097 | population_as_of = Dec. 2010 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Zognesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 334 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 24019 | area_code = 0345 | website = {{official website|http://www.zogno.com}} | footnotes = }} '''Zogno''' is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Bergamo]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region of [[Lombardy]], located about 50 km northeast of [[Milan]] and about 11 km north of [[Bergamo]]. As of 31 December 2010, it had a population of 9,097 and an area of 34.9 kmÂ².<ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].{{Full|date=November 2012}}</ref> The municipality of Zogno contains the ''[[frazione|frazioni]]'' (subdivisions, mainly villages and hamlets) Endenna, Somendenna, Grumello de' Zanchi, Poscante, Stabello, Miragolo San Marco, and Miragolo San Salvatore. Zogno borders the following municipalities: [[Algua]], [[Alzano Lombardo]], [[Bracca]], [[Brembilla]], [[Costa di Serina]], [[Nembro]], [[Ponteranica]], [[San Pellegrino Terme]], [[Sedrina]], [[Sorisole]]. == Demographic evolution == <timeline> Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.8) id:sfondo value:rgb(1,1,1) id:barra value:rgb(0.6,0.7,0.8) ImageSize = width:455
